# LP_Interview2.py
# Write the output of this file

class Parent(object):
	x = 1

class Child1(Parent):
	pass

class Child2(Parent):
	pass

print Parent.x, Child1.x, Child2.x

Child1.x = 3
print Parent.x, Child1.x, Child2.x

Parent.x = 7
print Parent.x, Child1.x, Child2.x
